title: Several cards, many HOFers...Prices reduced today big time!

posts.post_title: Several cards, many HOFers...Prices reduced today big time!
posts.post_content:
SGC 96 Bill O'Hara (N.Y.), corners look gem mint....Trades/Offers
SGC 96 Johnny Kling, impossible to find in high grade, fantastic card...Trades/Offers
SGC 96 Harry Lumley Pied 150, 50/50 centering, why not a 98?..Trades/Offers
SGC 96 Dutch Revelle Old Mill, 50/50 centering, razor corners, why not a 98? Trades/Offers
PSA 8MC Ty Cobb (Green Port.)...centering off top to bottom, other than that, flawless. Straight 8 just sold for $132k last month....Investment card
PSA 8OC Ty Cobb (Red port.)...Card is absolutely incredible, flawless color and registration, snow white borders, offers...
PSA 9OC Germany Schaefer (Detroit)....Tough common in high grade......$995, Final price $795
SGC 86 Hugh Jennings (2 hands showing)....Tough HOFer in high grade, 50/50 centering....$1795, Final price $1565
SGC 86 George Brown (Chicago) Pied 150...One of the toughest commons in high grade in the entire set, nicely centered. Only 3 PSA 7's and 2 PSA 8's of all backs. Fantastic card....$1950, NOW $1875, Final price $1595
SGC 86 Rube Manning (pitching)...$975, impossible to find in high grade (Only 1 PSA 7!) NOW $945, Final price $795
SGC 86 Bill O'Hara (N.Y.) Pied 350...$895, extremely tough common in high grade (Only 1 PSA 8!) NOW $850, Final $695
PSA 7 Chief Bender (Port.) Pied 150, beautiful card with strong corners......$2650, Final price $2485
SGC 84 John McGraw (Port., no cap) Pied 150....$1495, fantastic card with razor corners...Final price $1385
SGC A Addie Joss (Port.), tough Sov. 150 back. Card looks like a 7 or 8, perfect corners and centering and not trimmed, but very tiny spot in the yellow field that was touched, shows under black light. Must see to believe, $575...Final price $450















PSA 6.5 Bill Sweeney (Bost.) Old Mill, highest graded, fantastic card.....$495, Final price $450
SGC 82 M. Brown (pitching) Tolstoi, highest graded by SGC or PSA......$1650, Final price $1495
SGC 82 (6.5) Walter Johnson HOF (hands at chest) Tolstoi, highest graded....Looking for cash or trade offers
PSA 6 Joe McGinnity HOF Pied 350...$485, Final price $455
BVG 6 Charlie Fritz Old Mill, nice SLer....$415, NOW $395
SGC 70 Cy Young (Port.)....razor sharp card, incredible.....$3100, Final price $2850
SGC 70 John McGraw HOF (Port., with cap), corners look like 8's...$415..Final price $365
PSA 5 Frank Chance HOF (bat) Pied 350-460, corners are NM...$395, Final price $375
PSA 5 Nap Rucker (throwing) EPDG, highest graded by PSA...$425, Final price $375 
SGC 70 Mike Donlin (bat), very sharp corners, great card for the grade....$175, Final price $145
SGC 20 Jake Beckley HOFer, pumpkin orange color, very rare variation, strong card for the grade....$295
